Job Title: Web Landscape Strategist

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Web Landscape Strategist Philadelphia, PA (Remote/ Must reside in the Eastern Time Zone) 
Are you passionate about working remotely and staying ahead of web trends? ARC Group seeks a dynamic Web Landscape Strategist with a background in the pharmaceutical industry to join our client's expanding team. In this role, you will spearhead the analysis of external web dynamics, leveraging qualitative and quantitative data to drive our client towards a more data-centric approach in web evolution within the pharmaceutical sector.
This is an initial 6-month project with the potential for extension, transitioning to direct employment with our client. Offering competitive compensation, comprehensive benefits, and the flexibility of 100% remote work, this opportunity requires candidates to be based in the Eastern Time Zone.
Please note that sponsorship is not available for this position, and candidates must not require sponsorship now or in the future. Additionally, we are unable to consider candidates represented by C2C (bench) recruiters.
Job Description: Conduct competitive web landscape analysis through secondary research Stay abreast of web trends and best practices (excluding social or digital advertising) Collect, organize, and analyze global and country-specific web-related market research Gather regulatory insights, including country-level web restrictions Incorporate output from CX (Customer Experience) initiatives into commercial web strategy Propose methods for acquiring additional insights from healthcare professionals (HCP) and healthcare consumers (HCC/patients) for web enhancement Provide ad-hoc support to the web team as required  Requirements:  Minimum of five years of relevant experience, with at least one year in the pharmaceutical industry Demonstrated expertise in Digital/Web Strategy and Competitive Intelligence is a must Previous experience within the pharmaceutical industry is required, preferably in an in-house role rather than agency-based Proficient in web analytics tools, specifically Google Analytics Previous job titles such as Web Strategist, Digital Marketing Manager, or Digital Marketing Strategist in the pharmaceutical sector are beneficial Living in the Eastern Time Zone is required to qualify for this role. 
Would you like to know more about this role?   For immediate consideration, please send your resume directly to D.A. Longhi by emailing him directly at dlonghi@arcgonlien.com or calling him at (904)289-8828. You can also apply online and view all our open positions at  www.arcgonline.com .
ARC Group is a Forbes-ranked top 20 recruiting and executive search firm working with clients nationwide to recruit the highest quality technical resources. We have achieved this by understanding both our candidates' and client's needs and goals and serving both with integrity and a shared desire to succeed.  
ARC Group is proud to be an equal-opportunity workplace dedicated to pursuing and hiring a diverse workforce.
